alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills; Washita; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 07 at 8:57PM CDT until July 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and western Oklahoma, including the following counties, in northwest Oklahoma, Dewey, Ellis and Woodward. In western Oklahoma, Beckham, Custer, Roger Mills and Washita. * WHEN...Until midnight CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 857 PM CDT, the public reported flooding in Elk City due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 1.5 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Elk City, Cheyenne, Vici, Hammon, Canute, Leedey, Camargo, Strong City, Angora, Moorewood, Roll, Foss Reservoir, Harmon and Berlin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills; Washita; Woodward
